column1: Uchi////We also got the karaage - fried chicken thighs with this spicy glaze on the outside
column2: served with pickled veggies.  So delish - but they definitely have some heat.  I like spicy food
column4: especially when eaten with the cool pickled veggies (cauliflower
column6: etc).  But the hubby couldn't finish his share - more for me!
